website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX7240 Pro Wireless WXGA 3LCD Projector offers a bright, high-quality image for data, watchable video, a light weight, and a long lamp life to minimize running costs.
pros: Excellent quality for data images in our tests

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector BAD WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these projectors in June and all have been working with picture quality better than expected. the reason I rated so low was because of warranty period. One projector just died for no reason. Wasn't overheated bulb is fine, yet projector just won't power up. Tried different outlets and replacing cords still with no success. Because return period is so short I have to take a loss on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Wireless requires additional purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works however the #1 reason for the purchase was to use the wireless feature. The product never mentioned the wireless feature requires an additional $100 USB connect
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Wireless too slow to stream videos!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product technically does what it say it does, BUT: - I chose this projector because of the wireless connection, but the wireless mode is too slow to stream videos!!! This mode is only for presentations. -pay attention to the loud noise level : 37db ! I forgot to check that before buying. -doesn't come with an hdmi cable, which might be necessary depending on your computer, since the wireless is almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: Chevallier

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, with very little use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased March 27 2017, failed to power on November 19 2018. Worked well then while we were using just turned off. No indicator lights nothing. Responded like it was unplugged. When considering its application for a golf simulator, I would guess less than maybe 100 hours of use. Called epson, of course it's out of order. Considering other reviews this failure isn't uncommon. This unit has been replaced with the EX7260. However no changes with the exception of lumens. Buyer beware..
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: ... meetings it has works well so far with a nice bright image in fact it works so well that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a year ago for my church to be used in small group meetings it has works well so far with a nice bright image in fact it works so well that I just bought a second one to be used in another location. Plus random non-tech people have no issues setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: James Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for what I do
customer_reviews.text: This porjector is great for the money. Just got is and practiced with it. Seems like it is what they say it is. It is easy to use and set-up. I have set it up with my computer, I-pad, and internet all works great so far. I bought the Workforce case to protect it and it seems to fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tano

customer_reviews.title: Great projector; very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a projector for engineering and business presentations in well-lit rooms. After a fair amount of research and thinking through the various trade-offs I picked this one and am very happy with it thus far. Exceptionally clear and bright, and awesome color rendering. Dead-simple plug-n-play setup when using a cable to my laptop. Have not tried the wireless setup, so can't speak to that. Feels solid and well-made. However, if you will be travelling with it I do recommend you get a proper case for it as the case it ships with is a 'courtesy case' that provides you something out-of-the-box to carry it in but that does not offer any real protection. Other than that, all good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Ward

customer_reviews.title: good projector, poor case
customer_reviews.text: great projector, just wish it came with a better carrying bag instead of the flimsy one it comes with. I was able to use my old DELL case and fit the new one in there.
customer_reviews.author: Vanbrabant

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector!
customer_reviews.text: Exellent projector. I have 5 or 6 of these now and have been very happy with the features and quality. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: With only gentle use, the mechanism that holds the tilt adjustment foot in position broke. I know this isn’t a high end projector but would have expected more durable plastic parts. For what it’s worth the picture quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: This worked ok. I could not get any devices ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked ok. I could not get any devices to work through the USB computer plug, I had to use the RCA cables. The laser pointer on the remote did not work.
customer_reviews.author: John Suchan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, excellent performance/price ratio. Wi-Fi works pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice image quality: both resolution and bright amount as expected. WiFi capabilities work as expected. Of course, Wi-Fi screen mirroring frame rate is about 15 fps, but that's enought for what we use it for. I've tested Wi-Fi streaming from Windows PC, Android Phone, and iOS.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan M.

customer_reviews.title: I am glad to make a good decision that order this projector ...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to make a good decision that order this projector after I have studied Many different items over one moth, this is a high quality projector, I don’t need watch it in darkness room , I got all what I want , :) !
customer_reviews.author: Mei-Lan Shih Royall

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful projector.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful projector. Exceeded expectations. Used primarily for business presentations that include videos. Excellent video quality even in well lit rooms. Expensive yet very much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wood

customer_reviews.title: Clean pictures
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this projector when I was in long vacation in Africa, I played movies by honking it to my iPad and laptop
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Binissa

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: No audio out but can be remedied with a HDMI audio extractor
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for every type of use. Sharp and clear pictures
customer_reviews.author: Chaim-Moshe T.

customer_reviews.title: This has been amazing. It's lasted me a long time and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing. It's lasted me a long time and I use it almost every day for prolonged periods. I could not be happier with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Senseisational

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could say something good about this projector
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say something good about this projector. We ordered it a year ago and from the start we had problems with it overheating. We have to have a fan blowing at it all the time in order to stop the fan getting extremey loud and it shutting down do to over heating.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Polmateer

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and super bright picture! Great entry level projector for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D.

customer_reviews.title: we love it, great picture so
customer_reviews.text: fast deliver, they do their job. we love it, great picture so clear
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Epson Ex7240 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Good quality projector. Need to make accessories available for purchase at order time. i.e.: wireless module, HDMI cables etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!! Very bright and extremely easy to use. May (will) order more
customer_reviews.author: United Computer Services Inc.

customer_reviews.title: the projector is PERFECT! my only issue is hooking up too external ...
customer_reviews.text: the projector is PERFECT! my only issue is hooking up too external speaker. Any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: I give regular Gardening educational talks. This projector is fairly lightweight and easy to set up. The picture quality is great. I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Bright, portable, great picture
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these for work, knew it was gonna be great. I actually prefer refurbished electronics, I have had great experiences them. Plus the price couldn't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: kari ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance and Features
customer_reviews.text: For this price point, this is an excellent quality projector. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentBuyerWA

customer_reviews.title: Very bright projection.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat hard to set up, but works like a charm after set up.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector. Had some questions on linking wireless to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Projector. Had some questions on linking wireless to the PC, so called support. Excellent support person talked me through how to set it up. Have used it several times since, all flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best quality and color crisp projector for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The best projector quality that I ever seen, just perfect and crisp color, it's amazing the quality of this product for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: It is not working! I can’t even install it becouse projectors manual menu is not appearing on the screen! I think something wrong with system
customer_reviews.author: Akramov

customer_reviews.title: great picture its sharp clear even during the day
customer_reviews.text: great picture its sharp clear even during the day . will be our daily tv driver. best picture returned 2 projectors last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle V.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, for outside in the yard for the big fight, bright enough for a bright room and the price is right!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bevsfatcatsalon

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: exceeds expectations, vibrant color, easy to set up and operate, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Brunton

customer_reviews.title: This projector has an awesome picture even in a well lighted room
customer_reviews.text: This projector has an awesome picture even in a well lighted room. I am using it for a driving school. Would have given 5 stars if the built in speaker was a little bit stronger. I will need to use a external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Nault

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very bright clear picture. Easy to use. Adjustment and focus works well. A better case would be good if you do a lot of traveling with it. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: dgolfnut

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent projector. The wireless feature is like nothing i've ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent projector. The wireless feature is like nothing i've worked with before and I am a professional. Once you download the free app, You point the camera at the QR code that the PJ displays and it does everything else for you. I was able to stream live video, pictures, and pdf files from my phone to the PJ in about 2 min from the time I plugged it in. It fills up a 270" 16:9 screen very well at a pretty good resolution and an excellent brightness for about 20ft away . For the price- this PJ is great.
customer_reviews.author: ShineyMcShine

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the ease of hooking it up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the ease of hooking it up to the laptop and with the clarity of the photos and text being projected.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A

customer_reviews.title: Big, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work since I do presentations sometimes and need to take my own projector. I haven’t used it for work yet, but the performance seems pretty solid. I played with it using my home cable box and the image is quite bright and sharp. I connected it to my iPhone using wires and was streaming Netflix without any issues. The thing has a speaker too, which is decent enough for a small room, but certainly won’t replace a sound bar or any other dedicated audio system. It’s also a bit bulky for transport, but I knew that before I bought it so can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kooshball

customer_reviews.title: Good for work, but choose the model that don't have wireless for your home!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the wireless to work with my windows machine using miracast. Unfortunately it needs an app. I would've given 5 starts if the app could be used to stream the computer or phone screen... But it only streams ppt, docs, jpgs... Good for work, but pricey for for home usage.
customer_reviews.author: Adriano

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution, roughly 720p is the best I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Great resolution, roughly 720p is the best I can get out of it. Has great throw and brightness but puts out a ton of heat, to the point its worrysome at times. The wifi connectivity is poor, if you hook to it on your phone or computer you loose internet connection. To me that makes it a worthless option, we just use the HDMI connection and its fne.
customer_reviews.author: Drewis1337

customer_reviews.title: Plenty bright for a dim room. If you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty bright for a dim room. If you have sunlight or ambient lighting, it may or may not be bright enough for you. Ours is in a completely dark room with very little ambient light, and about 20 feet away from the wall, and it's bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: ironorr84

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised. Small sanctuary seats 300 people and even with morning sun shining from behind are where images are projected, everyone could see perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.author: A Cross

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case is nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, crisp clear colors, and light weight. The carrying case is nice to have, but if you are going to be doing airport travel, you may want to get something more robust and protective to carry it in. But the projector itself is great and light weight. Very portable.
customer_reviews.author: James Hallenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Wireless connection was fairly easy-just be sure to follow the steps and be sure to install the software. My Lenovo doesn't have a CD drive so I downloaded the software online. Also had to download a driver for the USB connection but that may have just been my computer. Overall easy to setup and quality of the projection is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Moson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Love the wifi
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the office. Very great. Just set it up on the wireless network and download the software to your device, you're ready to connect
customer_reviews.author: Kenny242

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my previous model. Much has been improved.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! The image is bright (even in a bright room with windows) and the sound is great. It's not surround sound, but it's sound is loud enough you don't need it. I'm glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome projector, only thing is i wish you attach speakers to this system for better sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: clear and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: It is great. Clear and sharp picture. I might update later to report the clearness in a bright room.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase Projector works well easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The current audio sucks and it's not even a month old yet
customer_reviews.text: The audio output is nowhere to be see. The current audio sucks and it's not even a month old yet. The audio keeps cracking. Don't buy this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but low sound qualityfor movies or sports
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 star if not for the inability to hook up an external speaker. Looks great but low sound qualityfor movies or sports. I used an hdmi splitter from my living room tv and ran a separate soundbar to the outdoor projector and it solved that issue.
customer_reviews.author: RYNO Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector
customer_reviews.text: A really great projector. Picture is crystal clear and can easily be used for theater display at home. Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: AARON M CROSSON

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. I wanted a wireless system as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I wanted a wireless system as I wanted to mount the system in the roof. This was just what I wanted. I am able to connect my phone and other devices using epson iprojection without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mc Garrell

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky and old looking. And the quality if ...
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky and old looking. And the quality if the projection is less than the one I had with less lummens. Also, expensive for wha I received.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, highly recommend it. Used for training classes, it provides a very sharp, very clear image. Also works in room with light/sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy/Nice picture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture and easy to use. Wireless works great, download software on Apple, Windows or phone and your up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Ray

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The pcfree feature is useless and the lack of an audio output jack is frustrating. Expected better at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gravel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy! The unit does not have audio outputs
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! The unit does not have audio outputs. Be aware all ports are input only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: It works just the way I expected and the quality of the projected image is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Probably works well, but was stolen off my porch within 30 minutes of UPS delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Reed B.

customer_reviews.title: great product except you can't attach surround sound speakers to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery, great product except you can't attach surround sound speakers to it. Luckily for me I was smart to run it through my Xbox 1S. Flickers a little on video, but still worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: MSGRubicon

product_meta.title: Epson EX7240 Pro WXGA 3LCD Projector Pro Wireless, 3200 Lumens Color Brightness
product_meta.description:
Style:EX7240 Pro

Present like a pro with the EX7240 Pro wireless projector, boasting enhanced features and comprehensive connectivity for the latest devices. Project HD-quality presentations and video from laptops, smartphones, tablets and streaming devices. Portable and easy to use, the EX7240 Pro delivers widescreen WXGA resolution (1280 x 800), plus 3200 lumens of color brightness and 3200 lumens of white brightness (3). It also includes HDMI, MHL support, and quick wireless setup. For powerful, future-proof performance, choose the EX7240 Pro.

3. Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15.4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118.
4. To use Epson iProjection, the projector must be configured on a network. Epson projectors can be networked either through the Ethernet port on the projector (check model specifications for availability) or via a wireless connection. Check your owner’s manual to determine if a wireless LAN module must be purchased separately to enable wireless connection on your Epson projector. Not all Epson projectors are able to be networked. Availability varies depending on model.
5. Based on TFCinfo: US Projector Brand Customer Perception and Preference Study, Multimedia Projectors 2015.
6. Color brightness (color light output) measured in accordance with IDMS 15.4. Color brightness will vary depending on usage conditions. Compared to leading 1-chip DLP projectors, based on NPD data for June 2013 through May 2014 and PMA Research data for Q1 through Q3 2013.
7. Data source: ProjectorCentral.com, Jan. 2014. Average of 1243 shipping models for which the manufacturers provided lumens and total power data, all resolutions and brightness levels. Energy efficiency was measured as wattage per lumen. It was measured for both 3LCD and 1-chip projectors in each of six brightness segments. 3LCD projectors averaged less required electricity per lumen in each of the six segments.
8. 9 out of 10 people preferred images from leading 3LCD projectors over leading 1-chip DLP business and education projectors. Leading projectors selected according to NPD data as of July 2013. Based on independent U.S. research conducted by Radius Research (July 2013).
9. ECO Mode is up to 10,000 hours. Normal Mode is up to 5000 hours. Lamp life will vary depending upon mode selected, environmental conditions and usage. Lamp brightness decreases over time.
10. iOS supported formats and files: Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx, Office 2003 or later), PowerPoint (.ppt, .pptx, Office 2003 or later), Excel (.xls, .xlsx, Office 2003 or later), Keynote (.key ’09 format; Keynote 6.0 not supported), Adobe PDF (.pdf, PDF 1.7, Acrobat 8 compatible or later), JPG and PNG; Android supported formats and files: Adobe PDF (PDF 1.6), JPG, JPEG and PNG.
11. For convenient and reasonable recycling options, visit our official site.
12. SmartWay is an innovative partnership of the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency that reduces greenhouse gases and other air pollutants and improves fuel efficiency.
feature_bullets: Look for two numbers: 3200 lumens (3) Color Brightness for more accurate, vivid color and 3200 lumens (3) White Brightness for well-lit rooms.
Pro-quality projector — WXGA resolution (1280 x 800) offers 2x more resolution than SVGA for HD-quality presentations; plus enhanced connectivity.
Wireless — project from your laptop, tablet, or smartphone (4) without plugging into the projector, so you can move freely about the room. Weight: 5.3 pounds
Share HD videos directly from your smartphone, tablet or streaming device — supports MHL-enabled devices, including Chromecast and Roku Streaming Stick.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
